genresAdvancedInfo.name: indian instrumental rock
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Indian instrumental rock is a fusion genre that combines traditional Indian instruments with rock music. It often features electric guitar, drums, and bass guitar alongside sitar, tabla, and other Indian instruments. This genre is characterized by energetic and dynamic rhythms, powerful guitar riffs, and intricate melodies.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
